channel.title: Red Hat Mobile Status
channel.description: View the current status of key services hosted on the Red Hat Mobile Application Platform

item.title: Brief Service Disruption to Evals Grid (US-Tom)
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: 2017-05-03 18:41 UTC We are currently experiencing some disruption to service in our Evaluation Grid US-TOM App Studio. We are actively working on this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible. UPDATE: 2017-05-03 18:50 UTC The root cause of the issue has been identified and resolved. All services have resumed normal operation. Please […]
item.content:encoded:
2017-05-03 18:41 UTC

We are currently experiencing some disruption to service in our Evaluation Grid US-TOM App Studio. We are actively working on this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible.

UPDATE: 2017-05-03 18:50 UTC

The root cause of the issue has been identified and resolved. All services have resumed normal operation. Please accept our apologies for any disruption this may have caused.

item.title: Service Disruption to the US-TOM Grid
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: We are currently experiencing a disruption in service in our US-TOM grid. We are in the process of investigating this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible. UPDATE 2017-04-30 13:17 UTC The root cause has been identified and corrective action is being taken in order to restore proper service. UPDATE 2017-04-30 […]
item.content:encoded:
We are currently experiencing a disruption in service in our US-TOM grid. We are in the process of investigating this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible.

UPDATE 2017-04-30 13:17 UTC

The root cause has been identified and corrective action is being taken in order to restore proper service.

UPDATE 2017-04-30 13:32 UTC

Restoration is about 75% complete. Final step is running and is expected to complete shortly.

UPDATE 2017-04-30 13:43 UTC

Restoration is complete. Preliminary testing shows all services are back up and running; however, we will perform additional verification before giving an ALL CLEAR.

ALL CLEAR 2017-04-30 13:55 UTC

Verification process has been completed. All services are fully operational.

item.title: Essential Maintenance Notification: Shared Enterprise EU (LON3)
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: RedHat Mobile has been informed by one of our infrastructure partners of a second major essential maintenance on our Shared EU Enterprise Platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to maintain infrastructure security. This maintenance has been scheduled for the following time periods: Wednesday, April 26th, 2017 08:30 – 09:30 UTC There will be […]
item.content:encoded:
RedHat Mobile has been informed by one of our infrastructure partners of a second major essential maintenance on our Shared EU Enterprise Platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to maintain infrastructure security.
This maintenance has been scheduled for the following time periods:

Wednesday, April 26th, 2017 08:30 – 09:30 UTC

There will be a brief period where the services on our EU Enterprise Studio and Cloud will be unavailable.

Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may cause. We welcome you to reach out to our Support Team via appropriate channels with any questions or concerns.

Commencement 2017-04-26 08:30 UTC

This maintenance task has begun.

ALL CLEAR 2017-04-26 08:55 UTC

This round of maintenance has been completed.

item.title: Essential Maintenance Notification: Shared Enterprise EU (LON3)
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: RedHat Mobile has been informed by one of our infrastructure partners of major essential maintenance on our Shared EU Enterprise Platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to maintain data centre infrastructure. This maintenance has been scheduled for the following time periods: Wednesday, April 26th, 2017 07:00 – 08:00 UTC All services should remain […]
item.content:encoded:
RedHat Mobile has been informed by one of our infrastructure partners of major essential maintenance on our Shared EU Enterprise Platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to maintain data centre infrastructure.
This maintenance has been scheduled for the following time periods:

Wednesday, April 26th, 2017 07:00 – 08:00 UTC

All services should remain operational throughout, however, there may be brief periods where the services on our EU Enterprise Studio and Cloud will be unavailable.

Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may cause. We welcome you to reach out to our Support Team via appropriate channels with any questions or concerns.

ALL CLEAR 2017-04-26 08:10 UTC

This round of maintenance has been completed.

item.title: SSL Certificate Renewal Notice for EU-LON3
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: As part of our ongoing commitment to quality, reliability and security, Red Hat Mobile wishes to advise customers hosted on its Shared EU Enterprise grid (EU-LON3) of some upcoming SSL certificate renewals, as follows: Tuesday, 18 April 2017 @ 09:00 UTC (10:00 IST) App Cloud Dev (https://*.df.dev.e111.feedhenry.net) App Cloud Live (https://*.df.live.e111.feedhenry.net) No services (or live […]
item.content:encoded:
As part of our ongoing commitment to quality, reliability and security, Red Hat Mobile wishes to advise customers hosted on its Shared EU Enterprise grid (EU-LON3) of some upcoming SSL certificate renewals, as follows:

Tuesday, 18 April 2017 @ 09:00 UTC (10:00 IST)

  • App Cloud Dev (https://*.df.dev.e111.feedhenry.net)
  • App Cloud Live (https://*.df.live.e111.feedhenry.net)

No services (or live apps) will be affected by these updates as this is a routine maintenance activity. However, if you have previously downloaded and/or installed one of these certificates in one of your local systems, you should bear this update in mind.

For any questions or concerns regarding this work, please raise a support ticket or contact your account manager directly.

ALL CLEAR 2017-04-18

The SSL certificates indicated above have been installed and verified successfully, with no impact on services or apps.

item.title: Essential Maintenance Notification: Shared Enterprise EU (LON3)
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: Red Hat Mobile has been informed by one of its infrastructure partners of essential maintenance on our Shared Enterprise EU platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to introduce additional security measures and maintain data centre infrastructure. This work has been scheduled for the following time period: Saturday, 22nd April 2017 at 23:00 UTC […]
item.content:encoded:
Red Hat Mobile has been informed by one of its infrastructure partners of essential maintenance on our Shared Enterprise EU platform (LON3). This work has been deemed necessary to introduce additional security measures and maintain data centre infrastructure.

This work has been scheduled for the following time period:

Saturday, 22nd April 2017 at 23:00 UTC to Sunday, 23rd April at 03:00 UTC.

They have informed us that disruptions are likely during the 2nd and 3rd hour of this maintenance to some Core MAP and MBaaS services. Please accept our apologies in advance for any inconvenience caused.

For any additional queries, please contact our support team via the Red Hat Customer Portal.

item.title: Temporary Disruption to the EU-LON3 Grid
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: 08:56 UTC Wed 5th Apr: We have experienced a temporary disruption to our EU-LON3 grid. Our engineers are investigating the issue, and will continue to post updates until a resolution is found. Update: 09:11 UTC Wed 5th Apr We have restored service to the affected grid. Our messaging system required the removal and recreation of an […]
item.content:encoded:
08:56 UTC Wed 5th Apr:

We have experienced a temporary disruption to our EU-LON3 grid. Our engineers are investigating the issue, and will continue to post updates until a resolution is found.

Update: 09:11 UTC Wed 5th Apr

We have restored service to the affected grid. Our messaging system required the removal and recreation of an exchange in order to allow services to correct connect to the relevant queue. This work has been done, and dependant services are connecting as expected.

As a follow up task we will investigate why the queue became blocked, and ensure measures are put in place to prevent this issue re-occurring.

item.title: SSL Certificate Renewal Notice on the US-CSG Grid
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: As part of our ongoing commitment to quality, reliability and security, Red Hat Mobile wishes to advise customers hosted on its Shared US Enterprise grid (CSG1) of an upcoming SSL certificate renewal for (*.df.dev.u101.feedhenry.net). This certificate is scheduled to be replaced on Tuesday, 4th April 2017. No services (or live apps) will be affected by […]
item.content:encoded:
As part of our ongoing commitment to quality, reliability and security, Red Hat Mobile wishes to advise customers hosted on its Shared US Enterprise grid (CSG1) of an upcoming SSL certificate renewal for (*.df.dev.u101.feedhenry.net).

This certificate is scheduled to be replaced on Tuesday, 4th April 2017.

No services (or live apps) will be affected by this update as this is a routine maintenance activity. However, if you have previously downloaded and/or installed this certificate in one of your local systems, you should bear this update in mind.

For any questions or concerns regarding this work, please raise a support ticket or contact your account manager directly.

item.title: Temporary Disruption to the AU-MAX1 Grid
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: We are currently experiencing a disruption in service in our AU-MAX1 grid. We are in the process of investigating this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible. ALL CLEAR 2017-03-07 01:07 UTC All services are responding as expected and we will continue to monitor the services closely.
item.content:encoded:
We are currently experiencing a disruption in service in our AU-MAX1 grid. We are in the process of investigating this issue and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible.

ALL CLEAR 2017-03-07 01:07 UTC
All services are responding as expected and we will continue to monitor the services closely.

item.title: Service Disruption on Core MAP (EU-EMA)
item.dc:creator: Mobile Cloud Operations
item.description: We are experiencing elevated response rates for our EU Grid (EU-EMA1) App Studio. We are currently investigating to determine the root cause of this issue. UPDATE 2017-03-06 10:15 UTC The underlying issue has been identified and resolved and services are now returning to normal. ALL CLEAR 2017-03-06 10:25 UTC We have completed our internal validation […]
item.content:encoded:
We are experiencing elevated response rates for our EU Grid (EU-EMA1) App Studio. We are currently investigating to determine the root cause of this issue.

UPDATE 2017-03-06 10:15 UTC

The underlying issue has been identified and resolved and services are now returning to normal.

ALL CLEAR 2017-03-06 10:25 UTC

We have completed our internal validation testing and are satisfied that all services are operating normally again.
